content.description: Very technical slab if you can get the start it gets a whole lot easier as long as you can keep your balance and slowly use your feet it's a gorgeous boulder.
content.location: You want to drive into the campground and the first campsite FF1 will be the place to stop then walk to the edge of the ravine to the resovoir just in front of the picnic benches you will see a small path down to a rock overlook that is the top of the boulder go to the left of the Outlook and downclimb a bit and then it will be right below where you were standing.

content.description: Sunny area that's high up above the reservoir with some strong breeze.
